objects.description: [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) used valid accounts to laterally move through VPN connections and dual-homed systems. (Citation: Dragos) (Citation: Dragos October 2018) In the Ukraine 2015 Incident, [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) used the credentials of valid accounts to interact with client applications and access employee workstations hosting HMI applications. (Citation: Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems March 2016)
